title: DDFP 589: State of the Dallas O-line & Will Mahomes start a game in '17?
itunes:title: DDFP 589: State of the Dallas O-line & Will Mahomes start a game in '17?
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Cynthia Frelund and former NFL offensive lineman Geoff Schwartz to discuss Ezekiel Elliott's suspension and how his absence will affect the team this season. Then, the "10-Ft Pole" segment returns, as the fellas and Cynthia determine whether or not they believe Trubisky will start more games than Glennon, if Russell Wilson could be the 2017 MVP and if Mahomes could start a game for the Chiefs this year. Lastly, producers Sully, Spaghetti and Sideline Savy wrap up the show with their weekly Game of Thrones recap.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
